title: elope Octopus Tentacle Horns Costume Accessory with Adjustable Band for Adults and Teens
features: VISUALLY STRIKING: Red and curled at the ends, these highly detailed, light weight "horns" resemble real tentacles
PERFECT FOR ALL OCCASSIONS: Great for gifts, cosplay, school plays, fairs, or costume parties
COMFORTABLE TO WEAR: Made of light weight EVA and secured with clear adjustable strap - this tentacle headwear is easy and comfortable for all day wear.
FOR TEENS AND ADULTS ALIKE: Safety tested for ages 14+, sized to fit most kids and adults. Ideal for everyday costume wear.
EXCELLENT QUALITY: Designed for you with love and laughter in Colorado Springs, USA. Made in China
description:
Master the sea, above and below in these Tentacle Horns by elope! No matter what sea creature you are, these tentacles are for you! Pair these tentacles with other elope costume wear for the ultimate cosplay experience (one set of tentacle horns only, all other costume accessories sold separately).
  • An elope original
  • 100% EVA
  • Spot clean only
  • Essential costume for octopus, sea creature, squid, monster
  • Safety tested for ages 14+, sized for most teens and adults
  • Secure with included clear adjustable strap or remove strap and attach horns to other material of your choosing
  • Designed for you with love and laughter in Colorado Springs, USA.
  • Made in China
